subject: Account Recovery Request Denied
preheader: Your recovery request was not approved. Contact support if you need assistance accessing your account.
plain_text:
Account Recovery Request Denied - {{company_plain}}

Hello {{user_display_name}},

Your account recovery request has been denied and cannot proceed at this time.

‚ùå RECOVERY STATUS

Request Time: {{request_timestamp}}
Status: Denied
Reason: {{denial_reason}}

ü§î WHAT THIS MEANS

Your selected guardians either:
‚Ä¢ Declined to approve the recovery request
‚Ä¢ Did not respond within the required timeframe
‚Ä¢ Insufficient approvals were received

This is a security measure to protect your account from unauthorized access.

üîÑ WHAT YOU CAN DO NEXT

1. **Try Again Later**
   ‚Ä¢ Wait 24 hours before submitting a new request
   ‚Ä¢ Contact your guardians directly if needed
   ‚Ä¢ Ensure they're checking their email and spam folders

2. **Alternative Recovery Methods**
   ‚Ä¢ Use backup codes if you have them
   ‚Ä¢ Try account recovery through security questions
   ‚Ä¢ Contact support for additional options

3. **Update Your Recovery Settings**
   ‚Ä¢ Once you regain access, review your guardian list
   ‚Ä¢ Add more trusted contacts as guardians
   ‚Ä¢ Enable additional recovery options

üìû NEED HELP?

If you believe this denial was in error or you're unable to access your account through other means:

Support Team: {{support_email}}
Security Team: {{security_email}}

When contacting support, please include:
‚Ä¢ Your recovery request timestamp
‚Ä¢ Any error messages you received
‚Ä¢ Description of the issue you're experiencing

üîí SECURITY REMINDER

Account recovery denials help protect against unauthorized access. If you did NOT request this recovery, your account remains secure and no action is needed.

üõ°Ô∏è PROTECTING YOUR ACCOUNT

To prevent future recovery issues:
‚Ä¢ Keep your guardian list current
‚Ä¢ Inform guardians they may receive recovery requests
‚Ä¢ Enable multiple recovery options
‚Ä¢ Store backup codes in a safe place
‚Ä¢ Regularly review your account security settings

We're here to help you regain secure access to your account.

---
